    • 方法详细资料

      • getERC20Balance

        public static Amount getERC20Balance(Address address,
                                     ERC20Token token,
                                     Revision revision)
                              throws ClientIOException
        Get amount from ERC20 contract.
        参数:
        address - address of token holder.
        token - ERC20Token required, the token ERC20Token
        revision - Revision if it is null, it will fallback to default Revision.BEST
        返回:
        Amount
        抛出:
        ClientIOException - ClientIOException

      • transferERC20Token

        public static TransferResult transferERC20Token(Address[] receivers,
                                                Amount[] amounts,
                                                int gas,
                                                byte gasCoef,
                                                int expiration,
                                                ECKeyPair keyPair)
                                         throws ClientIOException
        Transfer ERC20 token
        参数:
        receivers - Address array
        amounts - Amount array
        gas - gas at least 7000
        gasCoef - gas coef
        expiration - expiration
        keyPair - your private key.
        返回:
        TransferResult
        抛出:
        ClientIOException
